quest.name: A Miner Reborn
journal: Redolent Rose is furrowing his brow most furiously.

Mamajaru, the wealthy Lalafell for whom you once crafted an acton, intends to propose to Kokomo. Upon learning of this, Wawarukka rushes to the guild, exclaiming that he must tell the girl how he feels before it's too late. To that end, he begs you and Redolent Rose for a set of fine garments so he can make the best possible impression. Craft and deliver a high-quality pair of patrician's bottoms, a high-quality patrician's wedge cap, and a high-quality patrician's coatee to Redolent Rose─the guildmaster will prepare the other pieces.

Wawarukka is overjoyed by the ensemble you and the guildmaster have prepared. However, it may all be for naught─Kokomo is currently in the company of Mamajaru, and the guildmaster suspects that the proposal may be imminent. Wawarukka quickly departs for the Gold Court to see Kokomo, and Redolent Rose bids you follow to observe what transpires.

Though hesitant at first, Wawarukka rushes to Kokomo's side when Mamajaru attempts to strike her in a fit of anger. Filled with newfound confidence, he confronts the wealthy heir, who then flees. Now alone, Wawarukka and Kokomo stare deep into each other's eyes and begin a long-overdue conversation. Having observed that things are proceeding smoothly, you quietly excuse yourself. Return to the Weavers' Guild and tell Redolent Rose what you saw.

Upon hearing your account, Redolent Rose cannot help but laugh. Though clearly pleased to have helped the two young Lalafells, he asserts that he has acted only as a professional serving his clients. The future of Wawarukka and Kokomo's relationship is hardly certain, but he nevertheless compliments you on a job well done.

※The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose once you have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
objectives: Deliver a pair of patrician's bottoms , a patrician's wedge cap , and a patrician's coatee to Redolent Rose.
Follow Wawarukka to the Gold Court.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: If you've come in search of work, Forename, I'm afraid I have nothing for you.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: However, there is something I would like to discuss with you. It concerns Kokomo, and the young man currently courting her.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: You see, it is none other than─

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Forename! Big Rose! Please, you gotta help me!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> Clothes! I need new clothes!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Please, sir, you must get hold of yourself. Tell us what has driven you into this frenzy.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: He's gonna... <pant> He's gonna propose to Kokomo! Mamajaru─he's gonna propose!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: I know it ain't my place, an' I might just be gettin' in the way─but dammit, I've gotta tell her how I feel before it's too late!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: But if I meet her wearin' my usual duds, she'll reject me without a second thought!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: I need a fightin' chance! I need you two to do what you do best an' make me the finest clothes you can!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: One would have to possess a heart of stone to refuse an impassioned plea like that. Wouldn't you agree, Forename?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: If we are to send him against Mamajaru, we must furnish him with such garments as befit his passion.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Prepare a pair of patrician's bottoms, a patrician's wedge cap, and a patrician's coatee. I will see to his gloves and shoes. Each piece must be flawless, without exception. Together, we shall fashion a suit of armor for our young warrior.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Thank you both so much! I...I know I won't fail with you two on my side!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Please hurry, Forename! I've gotta say my piece before it's too late!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: I trust you understand what's at stake, Forename. Bring me a pair of patrician's bottoms, a patrician's wedge cap, and a patrician's coatee of the finest quality.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Your garments are ready, good sir. Allow me to assist you.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Gods almighty, is this really me...?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: If I may be so bold, I think this is quite possibly our finest work yet!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: I feel like I'm someone else, like a prince at a fancy ball, or─

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Hah! Sir, I have known princes. I am pleased to say that you are nothing like they.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Big Rose, I...I don't know what to say. Thank you. I think I'm finally ready to see Kokomo.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. About that─I would advise you to make haste. I suspect Mamajaru will make his intentions known ere long.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: What!? Are you sure!?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: I cannot say for certain, but a little bird tells me that Mamajaru and Kokomo are at present in the Gold Court. An ideal location for a romantic proposal, wouldn't you agree?

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: <gasp> I gotta hurry, while there's still time! Thanks, Big Rose!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Forename, be a dear and follow him. I would very much like to know how this all plays out.

dialogue.name: MAMAJARU
dialogue.text: And then the idiot had the gall to say that I knew nothing of business! To which I replied, of course I don't─why bother when you know the men who own them!

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Uh...

dialogue.name: MAMAJARU
dialogue.text: When I speak to you, I expect your full attention! I'll teach you how to behave, woman!

dialogue.name: MAMAJARU
dialogue.text: No, don't!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: How dare you raise your hand against a lady!

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: Kokomo, are you alright?

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Do...do I know you, sir?

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: It's me, Kokomo. Wawarukka. I made a few deliveries to your father's shop. Not recently, I suppose, but─

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Wawarukka!? But...why are you here? And why are you dressed like that?

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: For you, Kokomo. There's somethin' I've been meanin' to tell you─

dialogue.name: MAMAJARU
dialogue.text: I don't know who you are, but you will turn around and face me right this─

dialogue.name: MAMAJARU
dialogue.text: Y-You've made a powerful enemy today, my friend!

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I've never seen anyone stand up to Mamajaru like that before...

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: I s'pose they lacked the proper motivation.

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: I was hoping you would come visit again. But then you kept wearing such strange outfits...

dialogue.name: KOKOMO
dialogue.text: Promise me you won't do that again.

dialogue.name: WAWARUKKA
dialogue.text: A-As you wish.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. Tell me everything.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Hah! I would have liked to have seen that.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Hm? How did I learn of Mamajaru's plans, you ask? From the man himself, of course. He's not the sort to keep his grand designs private.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Do not misunderstand. I am not some rank sentimentalist. I have acted only in my capacity as a weaver to help a client─just as you have.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: As for our young couple...well, to be frank, calling them a couple is a tad premature. Babawai will doubtless have objections given Wawarukka's modest origins. Nevertheless, I think our young gentleman has finally found the courage to stand up for himself.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: You should be proud. This could be the beginning of a beautiful relationship─one which would owe much to your skill.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Well done, MistressMaster Surname. Well done indeed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This concludes the weaver quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: ※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Once you have done so, the next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose.
